snippet: The announcement came one day after they said they had found the cockpit voice recorder of the doomed plane, which crashed on May 19.
lead_paragraph: The announcement came one day after they said they had found the cockpit voice recorder of the doomed plane, which crashed on May 19.

headline.main: EgyptAir 804 Flight Data Recorder Is Found, Egyptian Investigators Say
headline.print_headline: Data Recorder of EgyptAir Jet Is Recovered
